quincer.name: Alexander Jonkers
quincer.details: "Four years ago I started out as a young intern at Quince. I wasn‚Äôt really sure what I was getting myself into but four years later I‚Äôm still here as a member of the Quince design team. My work is quite diverse, from supporting the DTP department to building microsites. Quince to me is a strong company because of the amount of care it has for its workers. We are a strong and social work force. Keywords: crafts, gaming, photography"

quincer.name: Alexandru Chiritescu
quincer.details: "What I like and do most of the time is creating software by writing code. I enjoy experimenting and learning new things all the time, as a way of improving who I am and what I do. I'm a music addict, book reader and guitar playing novice. Curious by nature, I like socializing, exchanging ideas and straight answers. I believe that a warm and joyful attitude can make the world much better. Keywords: learn, play, improve "

quincer.name: Andr√°s B√°lint Kisfaludy
quincer.details: "Designer and excessive copy-paste abuser. Is a chill guy with a high level of attention to detail, who never rests in his leisure time - whether it's eSports or team sports (streetball), he pursues the game constantly to improve himself. Doesn't believe in personal intro texts. Keywords: design, detail, sports"

quincer.name: Andrea Bakos
quincer.details: "The great daydreamer, child of Gaia, music lover. She is an expert in travelling, addicted on outdoor programs and dogs. In front of the screen she spends most of her time filling rows and columns with financial data, beside that she tries to solve all Hungarian Quincers‚Äô needs. If she loses her balance,¬† just let her run, or dance at a trance festival ‚Äì these are her special ways to meditate. If you seek a mate for any kind of extreme sports she will be a good choice, but keep in mind: she is a solar depending entity! Keywords: sun, run, fun"

quincer.name: Anita Varga
quincer.details: "Alias ‚ÄôMetal Lady‚Äô leads projects, aiming to deliver everything in Quince quality √°nd meet deadlines. When the evening comes Metal Lady finds it relaxing to care for her flowers (she‚Äôs especially proud of her herb plants) and evoke travelling memories by cooking Mediterranean specialties while singing Italian oldies. We honestly recommend to taste her dishes, but avoid to listen to her aria. Keywords: metal, flowers, travel"

quincer.name: Bal√°zs Kov√°cs
quincer.details: "Loves to design, animate and solve problems. Used to play simulator games as a hobby, sometimes as a profession. His favourite form of transportation is the motorcycle. Keywords: design, simulators, motorcycle"

quincer.name: Bart van Asperen
quincer.details: "My Quince shortlist consists of: design, production, 3D and learning all kinds of new stuff. The shortlist that typifies me personally includes (indoor) football, photography, reading, ex-Rotterdam, Feyenoord supporter and of course my wife Johanneke. Keywords: football, Rotterdam, design"

quincer.name: Ben de Dood
quincer.details: "Loves to write or edit text - whatever it takes to create better copy -, loves to read and has a penchant for live concerts, tattoos and strange facts. His favorite form of transportation is the bicycle, but in his mind this lifelong Trekkie with a dark sense of humour travels at warp speed to explore the universe. Keywords: rhetoric, books, outer space "

quincer.name: Benjamin Weijers
quincer.details: "Supporting, monitoring, testing all kinds of software related matters and improving workflow processes, that‚Äôs what gets Benjamin through the average Quince working day. Outside the office this tall guy keeps the beaches and the waters safe by acting as a lifeguard. He‚Äôs also a certified member of the Red Cross Events Team, so rest assured you can feel pretty safe with this guy around! Keywords: improvements, helping each other, lighten the burden"

quincer.name: Charles Meijboom
quincer.details: This Quincer knows how to develop a complete campaign in no time. Loves to create and have fun, at the office and at home. Family man. Proud father of two. Care taker. Thinking up practical solutions. Typical Amsterdam humour. Superb karaoke singer. Dedication. Big heart. Keywords: Ajax, responsible, jokes

quincer.name: Coen Schaafsma
quincer.details: "Quince feels like a family business. That's why we work so well together. To make a long story short: pride, expertise, work hard, nice work, inspiration, respect, learn, friendship, openness, honesty, trust, pleasure, unity, family, a smile and a cold beer. Keywords: all of the above"

quincer.name: Csaba Magyar
quincer.details: "Knows the coding of love, the double-margin bug, static typing and action scripting, reads Bulgakov and can defend a 6 pool. At his screen you‚Äôll see anything from structured queries to spreadsheets over eclipse tabs. As a music lover since the age of seven he listens to some random band from morning coffee until late in the evening while working, biking around or chilling in the city with friends. Keywords: Starcraft, coding, music"

quincer.name: Daniel Levitton
quincer.details: "By day an all-round designer @ Quince. By night a DJ and party organizer. 24 hours per day a sporty man who loves design and loves to create beautiful things. Key words: music, motorcycle, design, sport"

quincer.name: David Peperkamp
quincer.details: "Quince is together and so am I. At the same time Quince is being yourself and so am I. To me it is also one big playground for creating beautiful things. To enter a room with a team and come out with something surprising. I love that. My inspiration comes from the empty plan ‚Äì when there‚Äôs nothing yet. My work includes campaigns, brand ID‚Äôs, retail activation, e-learning, displays and much more. Keywords: challenge, inspire, innovate"

quincer.name: D√°vid Szak√°ly
quincer.details: "Faking concepts. Bending vectors. Spraying pixels. Commanding with scripts. Talking with gifs. Inhaling forest air, exhaling smoke. Stroking his self and a black dog called J√≥. Kept alive by heavy basses, sugar and other stuff. Keywords: all of the above and more"

quincer.name: Diederick Koekkoek
quincer.details: "My typical day at Quince usually starts with ‚Ä¶ ‚Äòmmm, wouldn‚Äôt it be great/smart/fun/epic if ‚Ä¶‚Äô then a lot of ‚Äòtiktiktiktik‚Ä¶ blablalabla‚Ä¶ tiktik‚Ä¶ &$@#*!... del del. Tik, blabla and hopefully Ahaaaa!‚Äô Keywords: curiosity, anomalies, synergy, wonder"

quincer.name: Djamel de Ligt
quincer.details: "Globe trotter, single fin surfer, music lover and trends connoisseur. Operates in print media but is also known to develop or co-create just about everything from logos to websites and full-blown campaigns. If not at Quince, you can find him in the North Sea at Scheveningen, or in his beloved California, surfing the Great Ocean or hanging around on the beach. Keywords: surf dude, music, world"

quincer.name: Doruk Eker
quincer.details: "‚ÄúI eat, drink, code, debug, research, try to inspire, be inspired, work out, chat and have fun‚Ä¶ and all that under the same roof. I am the non-Dutch Amsterdammer working happily at Quince. I develop interactive experiences for online, offline and mobile. Keywords: sports, music, art"

quincer.name: Eszter Holczingern√© Tolnay-Knef√©ly
quincer.details: "Eszter is a true runner. In every sense of the word. She doesn‚Äôt like public transport so she always runs to the office. And at the end of the day she runs back fast to her three children. For this proud mother Quince is her therapy. A place where she can ‚Äòswitch off‚Äô the children for a while and ‚Äúenjoy all the possibilities of working in the finance department, like invoicing, transferring and filling excels J‚Äù. Keywords: runner, mother, finance"

quincer.name: Eva Gransier
quincer.details: "Always busy, love parties and make people happy. It made so much sense to incorporate that in my work! At Quince Events each day is different except for the colleagues who are invariably super nice and crazy, but in a good way. I really appreciate the opportunities for self-development and the amount of self-responsibility at Quince, must be one of the many reasons I still love my job! Keywords: shopping, organize, events"

quincer.name: Ewout Thieme
quincer.details: "Has joined the Quince development team working as a Java/Groovy/Grails developer, building web and Android applications but also handling IT tasks that require Unix/Linux knowledge, acting as a bridge between the boundaries of development and system administration. For his work he mostly uses Java based technology, but whenever he gets the chance he switches to the Ruby and Haskell programming languages. Enjoys playing and experimenting with bleeding edge technology, playing computer games, snowboarding, watching movies and listening to music. Keywords: technology, music, change"

quincer.name: Frans Deckers
quincer.details: "Graphic design, copy, user interface design, project management, storytelling, account management, coaching. Since I started at Quince in 2002, I‚Äôve explored all my fields of interest. At Quince there are no limits in doing what you want to do. This made me into a creative with a unique set of skills. Just like my colleagues who feel like brothers and sisters to me. With my fresh energy I‚Äôll boost any campaign that is meant to cause a change; whether it is in the field of e-learning, branding or retail activation. Bang! Keywords: leadership, freshness, making a difference"

quincer.name: Frederik van Otterlo
quincer.details: "One of the original metal heads in the studio. Creates still images and animates them on request. He‚Äôs into snowboarding, wakeboarding and scuba diving and is reputed to know a thing or two about Kung Fu, but he refuses to call any of these sports extreme. A silly joke is never lost on him. He much appreciates telling one himself or enjoying someone else‚Äôs sense of silly humor. Keywords: silly jokes, (frozen) water sports, metal music"

quincer.name: Gabor Foldvari
quincer.details: "Living on the edge, Born to be Quincer, KPN for life Keywords: nature, traveling, expat community"

quincer.name: G√°bor Bogosi
quincer.details: "Loves to listen to and compose music, ride bikes (mountain bike and bmx), play and watch football (FC Barcelona), read (Asimov), take pictures, animate, amongst other things. Keywords: listen, play, read"

quincer.name: G√°bor Varga
quincer.details: "Communicator, wine enthusiast, music lover and bit of a tech geek. At Quince, when he‚Äôs not dealing with clients, he‚Äôs out to meet new ones to co-create with. He enjoys riding his bike, having ros√© spritzers with friends and, last but not least, the industry he works in. In a few years he hopes to brew his own social craft beer, and once ‚Äôold and wise‚Äô, do the same with wine. Keywords: communicate, tech, the good things in life "

quincer.name: Gy√∂rgy Tolnay-Knef√©ly
quincer.details: "Transparent and open minded. A dreamer, a leader, a thinker and a father who strives for better understanding of the world and it‚Äôs problem behind the problems to make a change. A change that connects people! Next to Quince, he can easily be found on random playgrounds of Budapest with his kids or on a bike somewhere downtown. If you call, he won‚Äôt answer... but he will call you back! Keywords: lead, dream, think"

quincer.name: Han Albers
quincer.details: "Rolling out projects, building exhibition stands for Events, that‚Äôs what I mostly do for Quince. This may have something to do with the fact that I‚Äôm a handy, practical kind of guy. When not working I like to play sports or just play. Whichever I fancy at the moment. Keywords: work hard play hard"

quincer.name: Istv√°n T√ºtt≈ë
quincer.details: "Is always very curious. He likes to discover whatever interesting there is to find in technology and art. He spends countless hours together with his colleagues to provide a higher standard quality of graphic design. Also he has a passion to create things that react and adapt to changes in their environment. He hasn‚Äôt built his first robot yet, but he surely strides in that direction. Keywords: graphic design, technology, react & adapt"

quincer.name: Jamel van Laarhoven
quincer.details: "At Quince Events I manage projects from A to Z. I love to add details for the final touch, am quite used to working in the weekends (comes with the job) and would rather skip the mornings if possible (which is not the case). In my spare time I like to kitesurf in the summer or snownoard in the winter. Work hard, play hard. That‚Äôs what they say, right? Keywords: hotel lobbies, cocktails, audio visual products"

quincer.name: James Guy
quincer.details: "Passionate account manager who during week days is inspired by his colleagues and clients to create solutions for goals which are yet undefined ‚Ä¶ So James‚Äô maxim ‚ÄúDoing the impossible by doing it‚Äù is not that surprising. Neither that Mandela is his inspiration. On Saturdays he devotes his free time as a soccer team manager who guides young talented football players through the adventure called professional soccer. What does it mean to be a professional player? And what hurdles do these youngsters need to take? There is no easy route. ÄúIf I can reach one out of twenty, my goal has been fulfilled‚Äù Key words: Mandela, travelling, reading, movies"

quincer.name: Jeffrey Kors
quincer.details: "I‚Äôm Jeffrey, intern at the Events team. I am learning a lot at Quince! My colleagues really involve me in everything and I‚Äôve got acquainted with several parts of the Events business already. I help out building exhibition stands and have made a lot of great rides with the crew. I even baked pan cakes at an event. Also I‚Äôve met a whole bunch of new, really nice people! Keywords: soccer, Telstar, drinking beer with friends"

quincer.name: Jeffrey Schulz
quincer.details: "This well-organised and deadline driven Quincer loves to create for the creatives. With a smile on his face he juggles through the day to get every job done. And he‚Äôs doing so successfully. So there must be some truth in Jeffrey‚Äôs comparison: ‚ÄúTraffic is like juggling, making sure no ball will drop.‚Äù¬† J Key words: daughter, deadline, traffic"

quincer.name: Jeroen van Delft
quincer.details: "Transforming functional wishes of clients into working solutions, that‚Äôs the daily challenge for this long-time developer. He also programs stuff in his spare time, which resulted for instance in a neat film planner to accommodate a hobby he shares with several friends. One day he would really love to see the introduction of an actual Star Trek style replicator. Still being the practical guy: ‚ÄúThis will solve a lot of problems √°nd save a lot of time.‚Äù Keywords: movies, technology, solutions"

quincer.name: Jeroen van der Horst
quincer.details: "Hi! Because of my love and fascination for photography and film, I have founded Quince DOK, the photography and video subsidiary of Quince Amsterdam. We add more value to the retail and marketing solutions that Quince is known for. By deploying innovative techniques, different tools and a wide range of technical and creative experts we make even the craziest visual ideas reality. Keywords: Quince DOK, photography, film"

quincer.name: Jessica Dekker
quincer.details: During workdays dancing Queen Jessica is responsible for several accounts. And she always delivers her absolute best. In her spare time she loves to travel, have fun with friends and family, work out and of course dance, dance, dance. Preferably all night long. Key words: accurate, creativity, dedication

quincer.name: Joyce de Groot
quincer.details: "Good afternoon, this is Quince, Joyce speaking! How can I help you? This sporty-spice, multitasking Quince lady helps out on whatever job you have for her. And always with a happy face. In her free time she gets her kicks out of running, winter sports, salsa and exploring Amsterdam where she recently found a nice crib. Key words: festivals, spider in the web, organising"

quincer.name: Julian Gallimore
quincer.details: "I cannot tell you where I'm from, because I grew up a bit everywhere. What I can tell you is that I'm enthusiastic and passionate about new techniques and developments in programming. Here at Quince, I work a lot on interactive displays, developing our backend system that manages our interactive applications. I also do some front end development, creating mobile friendly web applications. Outside of work, my curiosity takes me to countries I haven't seen yet. Besides that, I love watching movies and playing games, and on those few sunny days that we get here, nothing can stop me from being outdoors. Key words: Development, games, outdoors"

quincer.name: L√°szl√≥ Ny√∫z√≥
quincer.details: "The ‚Äòbiggest‚Äô PHP developer at Quince Budapest. Amateur boxer and musician, plays bass guitar and drums in jazz, funky and rock bands. Always crooning and singing, using the furniture as his personal drum sets. Though he is the biggest, he is also¬† one of the youngest of the team. In his free time, he enjoys being near water. River, lake, or ocean, you name it! Keywords: boxing, music, water"

quincer.name: Lisette Koot
quincer.details: "Money, money, money ‚Ä¶ My work at Quince involves a lot of numbers and bills. And although my job description isn‚Äôt well known by my colleagues, they do like it a lot when their salary gets paid in time. I‚Äôm a real outdoor kind of Quincer enjoying (in no particular order) food, music, fun with friends, festivals, travelling, sporting ‚Ä¶ just doing something!!! Reading good books relaxes me. Key words: fun, finance, family"

quincer.name: Lotte de Jong
quincer.details: "Working at Events is challenging to this born and raised Egmond beach babe, who nowadays enjoys living close to Beach South (Strand Zuid) in Amsterdam. ‚ÄúEach day is full of surprises, you never know what to expect. I make a lot of fun with my crazy colleagues and learn new things every single day ‚Ä¶ on the most various subjects.‚Äù J Key words: cooking, festivals, friends"

quincer.name: Marcel Kors
quincer.details: "Everything is related to a number, I am born with numbers, I work with numbers and I‚Äôll end up as a number, somewhere in time‚Ä¶ I collect the money, I pay the bills bills bills. That‚Äôs what I basically do at Quince. But make no mistake: I love my job and all my colleagues, my motorbike (a BMW R1200GSA), running, the sun and last but certainly not least my kids Jeffrey and Mitchel. Keywords: numbers, numbers, numbers"

quincer.name: Marco Comparato
quincer.details: "Marco concepts, designs, and creates advanced interactive solutions, and is an evangelist for creative-technologies through Adobe, Google, and Open-Source tool-sets.¬† He is an American ex-pat from SF/LA/NYC. He also plays some guitar. Keywords: Sicilian Americans do it better"

quincer.name: Marijn Bouma
quincer.details: "Quincer since 2001. Front-End. Java. Security. Performance. Groovy. Grails. Research. Android. On a continuing journey to discover the world through travel, eating, cooking and music. Keywords: develop, discover, world."

quincer.name: Mark Rondema
quincer.details: "I'm the guy who fixes things. I'm the guy who makes magic from al kind of materials. But most of all I'm the guy who always keeps smiling :-)¬† Keywords: shooting pool, sailing, devising technical solutions"

quincer.name: Martijn Bon
quincer.details: All-round happy worker. Always-studying-linguistic-healthy-eating-festival-tiger. Keywords: 3D, print, digital, interaction design

quincer.name: Miranda Kasius
quincer.details: "My work at Quince? I can handle 56 countries‚Ä¶ and still counting. Being the peanutbutter between the sandwich of our designers & developers and all these foreign countries makes me feel on top of the world! Inside and outside of the office I am a happy girl who loves to enjoy life! I like to spend my spare time being creative; cook & bake, play with make-up, make handmade stamps, create lampshades, face/bodypainting. You can make me happy with a themed dress-up party and a great glass of wine served with some nice food! Keywords:¬† happy, positive, YOLO!"

quincer.name: Olaf Weijers
quincer.details: "Of my activities within Quince I like testing the best, just breaking sites and tools apart and going over every option in detail. Keywords: games (rpg‚Äôs), Japan, friends"

quincer.name: Patrick Weijers
quincer.details: Developer of dealer sites and online platforms for a lot of our clients. Responsible for the maintenance of several servers too. Patrick likes to work out, not a the Quince gym but with his DeskCycle. So he can stay fit and remain behind his desk at the same time. Keywords: PHP, green, cheese

quincer.name: Ralf Amama
quincer.details: "At Quince I‚Äôm a Jack of all trades. Helping out Events, taking care of office maintenance, stuff like that. Since my roots are from the creative side, I can also help out in the digital department. I‚Äôm what you call a textbook geek. I like Star Wars, games, movies, comics, you name it! I also like ancient cultures and travelling, the more when these go together. I also really like, perhaps even love Ford Mustangs. My strong points are that I‚Äôm visually oriented and a dreamer (not the sleep version). This may be related to being a geek! Keywords: geek culture, Ford Mustang, travel"

quincer.name: Raymond Schoos
quincer.details: "Technology, it‚Äôs all around me! Hi I‚Äôm Raymond, working for Quince Retail Solutions. I‚Äôm there to provide you the best customer experience possible! Keywords: gadgets, freedom, website creation, new born baby, creativity"

quincer.name: Remco Schoos
quincer.details: "Entrepreneur. Creating tangible things from abstract ideas. Gadget freak, technology enabled solutions. Making things practical. Playful. Making cool stuff work in retail. Enjoying the Quince team and colleagues. Proud to be Quince. Happy with the dedication of our colleagues. New stuff and new ideas are always popping in my head, always busy writing ideas down to use them whenever and wherever possible. Keywords: All of the above"

quincer.name: Rene van Bakel
quincer.details: "I‚Äôm a web developer. In addition I often give advice in other project about possible solutions and I lead a number of projects. Colleagues tell me they think I am ‚Äòsweet‚Äô and ‚Äòcaring‚Äô. That must be the reason I don‚Äôt shy from household chores, not even at Quince. My inspiration comes from my wife Amanda and my daughter Andrea, my natural curiosity about how things/people/animals work and from people who do what feels good, no matter what other people think. Keywords: family, care, curiosity"
